titleStmt.title: An appendix to a course of chymistry being additional remarks to the former operations : together with the process of the volatile sale of tartar and some other useful preparations / writ in French by Monsieur Nicholas Lemery ; translated by Walter Harris ...
Cours de chymie. English
titleStmt.author: Lémery, Nicolas, 1645-1715.
Harris, Walter, 1647-1732.

notesStmt.note: With (at reel 110:6b): A course of chymistry. London, W. Kettilby, 1677.
